subject: Order #SSN1596
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

A few weeks i notice a strange sound in my throttle paddle.
U find out it was from the hydraulic rod side bearing.

The bushing from the rod have play and assembly didn't solved it richt i
think.
I thinks this side bearings are nice to see only a bit useless,
teflon/plastic washers the same thickness are good to keep the rod in place
only don't tightens the bold hard!
Kan you help me with a new pease of the rod and bushing that are dammaged?
And a side bearing or washer of the same thickness?

I have olso ordered a 3rd VAM and clutch only the VAM and bracket didn't
had the 4mm bolts to mount the VAM to the bracket! I need 2 of those if
that is possible?

Kind regards,
Alex lampen

conversations.body_text: Hi A Lampen,  Please gather all the items that need to be photographed together, so I can clearly see which ones need to be resent.Â
